documents.document: Nice hotel but dont buy tickets through them Nice clean Hotel, friendly generally helpful staff, convenient location, only dissapointment, when I asked about buying tickets to see FC Barcelona, receptionist told me this could be done by them, ticket price was 80 Euros per ticket, this included delivery fee, when they arrived the face value of the ticket was 48Euros ! a delivery fee of 32Euros per ticket, a complete rip off.
